text: Israfil Alam (13 March 1966 â€“ 27 July 2020) was a Bangladesh Awami League politician. He was a member of the Jatiya Sangsad from 2009 until his death. He was born in Naogaon, Pakistan. Alam died on 27 July 2020 at a hospital in Dhaka from COVID-19, aged 54. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bangladesh Category:Politicians from Rajshahi Division Category:9th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:10th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:11th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Israfil Alam
